column4: hey guys! Can anyone tell me how to get my networking icon back on my taskbar?
How can I start the network manager?
guys how can I start the network manager from terminal?
nice
very very nice split there...
Nope, server split + autojoin ;-)
maybe - I haven't used irc for a while - back in my days this used to happen when servers splitted ;-)
nm-applet
thanks
I get an error when I type nm-applet
it's already running then

I need to get my icon in the taskbar somehow... my girlfriend did something and it disappeared without a trace ;-) Besides the laptop doesn't seem to have any wifi scanning done at all since the icon disappeared - I think she did more than hiding the icon \
add notification area to the panel, she may have removed it
how do I do that? I'm not that familiar with Ubuntu yet...
right click the panel, add to panel
when I right-click on the task bar and click "Add to panel" I get a list of programs, but nothing about networking...
search for notification area, see if it is already on panel
ah thanks! Could you tell me how to enable wifi searching?
it seems that I won't be needing the last one - it's already working. Thanks a lot for the help provided
welcome
if you right click on something placed on a panel, you can lock it to the panel, that way it is harder to remove it
already did that to prevent further investigations ;-) thanks though
